products.name: Linear Shaft
products.key_features: Hard chrome plated, high hardness (60-65 RC), high straightness (0.1 mm/m).
products.materials: EN-8/Ck45, SUS440C equivalent (stainless steel, alloy steel, carbon steel, aluminum, composite materials, plastics).
products.applications: Mating component for all linear motion bearings, industrial machinery, automation systems, 3D printers, and medical equipment.
products.differentiator: High surface hardness and precision grinding ensures long bearing life and smooth motion, with excellent wear resistance and dimensional stability.

specifications.hardness: Typically 50-79 Rockwell C (often case hardened to 58 HRC or higher)
specifications.surface_finish: Smooth (e.g., 0.15 μm to 0.3 μm Ra for recirculating ball bearings)
specifications.coatings: Anodizing, black oxide, ceramic, chromium, electroless nickel, Teflon (PTFE)

products.name: Shaft Support Rails
products.key_features: Fully supported shaft prevents deflection over long spans. Available in round, profile/square, and continuous support types.
products.materials: Carbon steel, stainless steel, aluminum alloy (sometimes ceramic-coated aluminum).
products.applications: Long-travel linear systems where shaft sag would otherwise be an issue, industrial machinery, automation systems.
products.differentiator: Provides continuous support for maximum rigidity and accuracy, accommodating higher loads and preventing binding.

specifications.hardness: Typically RC60 for steel shafts, RC50 for stainless steel, RC70 for ceramic-coated aluminum
specifications.length: Up to 4 meters (end-joinable for extended travel)
specifications.compatibility: Designed to work with various linear bearings including open type ball bushings, plain bearings, or roller bearings.

products.name: Shaft End Supports
products.key_features: Clamping-style aluminum blocks for securing shaft ends. Available in flanged, T-shaped, L-shaped, square, and round forms.
products.materials: Aluminum alloy (e.g., 6061-T6, 7075), cast iron, steel (e.g., 304, 316, carbon).
products.applications: Mounting and fixing the ends of linear shafts in a machine frame, minimizing deflection and vibration.
products.differentiator: Simple and effective way to mount and align linear shafting, with various tightening methods and material options.

specifications.tightening_methods: Slit/side slit, split, set screw, hinge type
specifications.mounting_options: Flanged, pillow blocks, compact type, wide type, split type, bottom mount

products.name: Precision Ball Screw
products.key_features: Gothic arch groove profile for high rigidity, low friction, no backlash with preload. High accuracy and repeatability.
products.materials: High alloy steel or stainless steel (often heat-treated to 60 ± 2 HRC).
products.applications: Precise positioning systems in CNC machines, actuators, robotics, and medical devices.
products.differentiator: High working efficiency (1/3 torque of ACME), high accuracy and reliability, with minimal backlash.

specifications.lead_accuracy_parameters: eₚ (average lead deviation), νᵤ (max deviation range), ν₃₀₀ (max deviation over 300mm), ν₂π (lead wobble)
specifications.backlash_reduction_methods: Selective fit, preloading (oversized balls, spring assembly)

products.name: Ball Screw Support Units
products.key_features: Pre-assembled units with high-precision angular contact bearings. Fixed (BK/FK, EK) and Supported (BF/FF, EF) side units.
products.materials: Burnished steel (for housings), stainless steel or ceramic hybrid (for bearings).
products.applications: Securing the ends of a ball screw assembly, providing rigid support and alignment in industrial applications.
products.differentiator: Simplifies design and assembly of ball screw systems, ensures proper bearing preload, and minimizes vibration and deflection.

specifications.bearing_types: Angular contact ball bearings (preloaded), deep groove radial bearings
specifications.lubrication: Sealed and pre-greased for lifetime lubrication
